channel.title: 711 Server Item stats editing problem
channel.description: I can't find where to edit stats of items in a 711 server, i wouldnt say im new to rsps's but im not very educated when it comes to them. I'm trying to give the "Lucky" armors stats now but i just dont know where to go. I've been looking for 20 mins and no luck. sorry for being nooby. i Hope someone can help.

item.title: 711 Server Item stats editing problem
item.dc:creator: @Newreality Newreality
item.description:
@Newreality wrote:

[quote=“johnny1223, post:2, topic:447888”]Well, I may be wrong, but I don’t believe you can edit those things, you would have to find a downloadable bonuses folder with the items in it to edit the stats yourself, than you would have to pack it.

Otherwise just take the bonuses.ib from a different server that has the right bonuses on items and put it in your server, but make sure you give them credit.

P.S: If you’re using a 667 source I have set all the bonuses on my server and could send it to you.[/quote]

I need to know how to edit stats for 667 server, can you add my skype danny-newrealityOwner please =)

Read full topic

item.title: 711 Server Item stats editing problem
item.dc:creator: @johnny1223 johnny1223
item.description:
@johnny1223 wrote:

Well, I may be wrong, but I don’t believe you can edit those things, you would have to find a downloadable bonuses folder with the items in it to edit the stats yourself, than you would have to pack it.

Otherwise just take the bonuses.ib from a different server that has the right bonuses on items and put it in your server, but make sure you give them credit.

P.S: If you’re using a 667 source I have set all the bonuses on my server and could send it to you.

Read full topic
